This case is left on record for all the religious world. Let those who know the word of the living God beware of cherishing the errors of the world. These Satan presents in an attractive style; for he would deceive us, and destroy the simplicity of our faith. If these errors are introduced, they will mar the precious landmarks of truth.--Ms 47, 1898, pp. 12-14. ("The Echo Office and Commercial Work," March 31, 1898.) 

Released May 23, 1975.
